title: Blueprint, Table Lamp, 1928–29
medium: yellow and orange color pencil on blueprint
inscribed: Upper left quadrant, front view: SOCKET (SMALL-2" LONG)/; left: SWITCH/WIRE OUTLET/THRU BUSHING; lower center: FRONT. Upper right quadrant, side view, to right, inscription referring to pivot of shade: UPRIGHT "A"/THICKNESS OF PIPE/PIVOT/SECTION/(FRONT)/SHADE TO TURN TO DOTTED POSITION; arrow leading to inscription above at center: SLOT 1 1/8 " LONG/PIVOT HERE; both in parentheses: ON 3 UPRIGHTS; Lower left quadrant, plan, with arrow: FLOOR PLAN CROSS HATCHED/; with arrow: LINE OF 1/2 OF 4 " DIAM PIPE. Inscribed at lower right: F.S. DETAIL LAMP/DESKEY-VOLLMER INC/114 EAST 32 ST/STOCK #/FINISH-BRUSH NICKEL; Vollmer information crossed out in yellow color pencil; inscribed in yellow color pencil, lower right: 145 W. 57th/DRAW# 574; in orange color pencil, lower right: 3 - & 12.
description: Table lamp design showing front, side, and plan. Semi-circular, barrel-shaped shade intersecting with three upright shafts, supported by two extending feet arranged in L shape. One foot running parallel to shade, the other parallel to shaft.

tombstone.epitaph: Blueprint, Table Lamp, 1928–29; Office of Donald Deskey (American, 1894–1989); USA; yellow and orange color pencil on blueprint; 51.5 x 70.4 cm (20 1/4 x 27 11/16 in.); Gift of Donald Deskey; 1975-11-321
